thread.title: Montgomery Ross & Associates Promotes Jeffery Rekunyk to Director of Associa OnCall

author: cnbc.com
title: Montgomery Ross & Associates Promotes Jeffery Rekunyk to Director of Associa OnCall
text:
Calgary, AB, CA, May 04, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Montgomery Ross & Associates announced the promotion of Jeffery C. Rekunyk to director of Associa OnCall (AOC).
Mr. Rekunyk has been with Montgomery Ross for more than two years where he manages a portfolio of high-rise units, and townhouse condominiums. He also focuses on helping boards and their communities manage and execute capital replacement and maintenance projects. In his new position, Mr. Rekunyk will focus on growing the Associa OnCall (AOC) platform for both Montgomery Ross & Associates and C-ERA Property Management & Realty.
AOC is Associa’s maintenance division that provides services to communities and homeowners throughout North America. AOC teams are professional, friendly and courteous, and provide a suite of services including maintenance and repairs, one-on-one consultation, contracted services, project oversight, interior and exterior restoration, and emergency restoration services.
“Associa OnCall is one of the most important initiatives for the organization,” stated Mike Clements, C-ERA and Montgomery Ross president. “Jeff’s hard work, dedication and innovative vision will help continue to expand and make AOC available to more clients. We are excited to expand the rollout of the maintenance and service provider platform, which will deliver services to our clients and begin the next phase of the AOC strategy.”
Mr. Rekunyk previously worked as an energy and investment consultant working in project management, economic analysis, A&D, and joint ventures to major Canadian energy companies and pension funds.
Mr. Rekunyk obtained a Bachelor of Science Honours Degree in Geology from the University of Saskatchewan. He has been a member of the Association of Professional Engineers and Geoscientists of Alberta (APEGA) for more than 20 years.
With more than 180 branch offices across North America, Associa delivers unsurpassed management and lifestyle services to nearly five million residents worldwide. Our 10,000+ team members lead the industry with unrivaled education, expertise and trailblazing innovation. For more than 40 years, Associa has provided solutions designed to help communities achieve their vision. To learn more, visit www.associaonline.com .
